constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 175 (Tuesday, October 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ESTES:
H.R. 5480.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 8 of Article I to make all laws necessary and
proper for carrying into execution the powers vested by the
Constitution
[Page H5600]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: To clarify the applicability of the Religious Freedom Restoration Act of 1993 to rules issued under the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 and to amend such Act to prohibit emergency temporary standards with respect to vaccines, and for other purposes.
